item.title: Tamme does not tell about |xue
item.summary: Tamme's father told him about |xue, as !nanni's grandfather Karu had told him. !nanni talks about |xue but Tamme does not. Tamme gives his mother's father's name.
item.comments: 1) p.9310v: see |xe, ||namme, and the |nani, 2) This story is found in Book XI & XII-4
item.author: Tamme (XII)

keyword.subkw: Tamme does not tell of him
what !nanni's and Tamme's grandfather's told them about him
what !nanni and Tamme were told and say about |xue
